galoot.types
Interface DocumentFragment

All Known Implementing Classes:
BlockFragment, Document, TextFragment
public interface DocumentFragment

A Document Fragment is constituent of a document. Document fragments have "content", which is user defined. The content can be anything, and can also be restricted.

Method Summary
 void addContent(java.lang.Object content)
          Add the given contents to the fragment.
 java.lang.Object getContents()
          Returns the contents of the fragment.
 

Method Detail

java.lang.Object getContents()
Returns the contents of the fragment.

Returns:

addContent

void addContent(java.lang.Object content)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Add the given contents to the fragment. This throws an IllegalArgumentException if the contents do not apply to this fragment.

Parameters:
content -
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
